page.title: Pathway Links
page.introduction: Objects in Physiology (species and reactions) and pathway entities in Pathway Model can be linked. The linked objects are marked with a letter 'L'.
page.operations:
Selecting a single species or a single reaction in a Reaction Diagram, Reactions Table View, Structure Diagram or Species Table view enables Pathway Links button. If a species or reaction is already linked to a pathway object, the user can see the Linked pathways objects. If this option is selected, the user will be transfered to Pathway Diagram view where linked objects will be shown in red.
The user can Edit Pathway Links...
